column2: An opportunity has arisen to attempt the kidnapping of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. My fellow plotters are just waiting for my signal to proceed.
column3: Une occasion s'est présentée de tenter l'enlèvement de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Mes collègues conspirateurs n'attendent que mon signal pour commencer.
column4: Eine Gelegenheit ist entstanden, um die Entführung von [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] zu versuchen. Meine Verschwörer warten nur auf mein Signal, um fortzufahren.
column6: An opportunity has arisen to attempt the kidnapping of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. My fellow plotters are just waiting for my signal to proceed.

column2: We strike after dark!
column3: Nous frapperons à la nuit tombée !
column4: Wir gehen nach Einbruch der Dunkelheit!
column6: We strike after dark!

column2: Wait for a better opportunity...
column3: Attendre une meilleure opportunité ...
column4: Warte auf eine bessere Gelegenheit
column6: Wait for a better opportunity...

column2: As I was sleeping, [From.GetTitledFirstName] broke into my bedchamber and put a dagger to my throat. I was forced out into the courtyard, where [From.GetHerHis] co-conspirators were waiting on fast horses. [From.GetTitledFirstName] now has me locked up in the basement of [From.GetHerHis] manor and is demanding that I give [From.GetHerHim] the land [From.GetSheHe] considers rightfully [From.GetHerHis]. If I refuse, [From.GetSheHe] is threatening to kill me...
column3: Alors que je dormois, [From.GetTitledFirstName] a pénétré dans ma chambre et m'a mis une dague sous le gosier. J'ai été conduit jusque dans la cour, où ses co-conspirateurs attendoient sur des montures fraisches. [From.GetTitledFirstName] m'a désormais enfermé au sous-sol de son castel et m'a demandé de lui donner la terre qu'[From.GetSheHe] considère comme son droit légitime. Si je refuse, [From.GetSheHe] m'a menacé de m'occire...
column4: Während ich schlief, brach [From.GetTitledFirstName] in meine Kammer ein und setze mir einen Dolch an die Kehle. Ich wurde in den Innenhof gebracht wo bereits [From.GetHerHis]e Mitverschwörer mit schnellen Pferden warteten. [From.GetTitledFirstName] kerkerte mich im Verlies von [From.GetHerHis] ein und verlangte, dass ich [From.GetHerHim] die Ländereien von [From.GetHerHim] an [From.GetSheHe] übergebe, die rechtmäßig [From.GetHerHis] gehören. Wenn ich mich weigere, droht [From.GetSheHe], mich zu töten.
column6: As I was sleeping, [From.GetTitledFirstName] broke into my bedchamber and put a dagger to my throat. I was forced out into the courtyard, where [From.GetHerHis] co-conspirators were waiting on fast horses. [From.GetTitledFirstName] now has me locked up in the basement of [From.GetHerHis] manor and is demanding that I give [From.GetHerHim] the land [From.GetSheHe] considers rightfully [From.GetHerHis]. If I refuse, [From.GetSheHe] is threatening to kill me...

column2: Take the land, just don't kill me!
column3: Prenez ces terres, mais ne me tuez point !
column4: Nim mein Land , aber töte mich nicht !
column6: Take the land, just don't kill me!

column2: I do not give in to threats
column3: Je ne cède point aulx menaces
column4: Ich gebe Drohungen nicht nach
column6: I do not give in to threats

column2: My guards caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] just as [From.GetSheHe] was about to break into my bedchamber, dagger in hand. Under interrogation, [From.GetSheHe] has confessed to planning to kidnap me to force me to give [From.GetHerHim] lands and a title.
column3: Mes gardent ont attrapé [From.GetTitledFirstName] juste au moment où [From.GetSheHe] allait pénétrer dans ma chambre, dague à la main. Sous la question,[From.GetSheHe] a confessé son projet de m'enlever pour me forcer à lui donner des terres et un titre.
column4: Meine Wachen schnappten [From.GetTitledFirstName] gerade als [From.GetSheHe]  versuchte in meine Gemächer einzudringen. Mit einem Dolch in der Hand !. Im Verhör gstand  [From.GetSheHe] das er plante mich zu kidnapen um mich zu zwingen Ländereien und Titel an [From.GetHerHim] zu geben.
column6: My guards caught [From.GetTitledFirstName] just as [From.GetSheHe] was about to break into my bedchamber, dagger in hand. Under interrogation, [From.GetSheHe] has confessed to planning to kidnap me to force me to give [From.GetHerHim] lands and a title.

column2: Let [From.GetHerHim] rot in jail
column3: Laissez [From.GetHerHim] pourrir dans les geosles
column4: Laßt [From.GetHerHim] im Kerker verrecken!
column6: Let [From.GetHerHim] rot in jail

column2: The punishment for treason is death!
column3: Le chastiment pour trahison est la mort !
column4: Die Strafe für den Verrat ist Tod!
column6: The punishment for treason is death!

column2: I will forgive [From.GetHerHim]... this time.
column3: Je vais lui pardonner... Pour cette fois.
column4: Ich vergebe [From.GetHerHim]... Diesmal!
column6: I will forgive [From.GetHerHim]... this time.

column2: My co-conspirators send word that they have prepared everything we need to discredit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Documents of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] corruption have been prepared, and courtiers have been bribed to whisper to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s incompetence. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] reputation in tatters, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will find it impossible to hold on to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] position on the council.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs m'ont prévenu qu'ils ont préparé tout ce qu'il faut pour discréditer [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Les documents compromettant ont été préparés, et les courtisans ont été soudoyés répandre des rumeurs à la cour de [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. Une fois sa réputation en lambeaulx, il ne lui sera plus possible de conserver son poste à la cour
column4: Meine Mitverschwörer senden wort, dass sie alles das wir brauchen, um [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] zu diskreditieren haben. Dokumente um [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Korruption dar zu legen wurden hergestellt und Höflinge wurden bestochen an [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] zu flüstern von [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s Inkompetenz . Mit [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Ruf in Fetzen, wird [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] es unmöglich finden um [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] Position auf dem Konzil zu halten.
column6: My co-conspirators send word that they have prepared everything we need to discredit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Documents of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] corruption have been prepared, and courtiers have been bribed to whisper to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s incompetence. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] reputation in tatters, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will find it impossible to hold on to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] position on the council.

column2: That position will be mine!
column3: Ce poste sera mien !
column4: Der Position wird mir gehören!
column6: That position will be mine!

column2: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Rumors of incompetence and corruption have undermined the authority of my position, and it seems that even [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] have come to believe them as I have been removed from my position at the council.
column3: Je me suis trouvé la cible d'une violente campagne de diffamation à la cour. Les rumeurs d'incompétence et de corruption ont miné ma réputation, et il semble que mesme le/la [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] en est venu à les croire que j'ai été démis de mes fonctions au conseil.
column4: Ich bin das Ziel einer bösartigen Verleumdungskampagne bei Hof. Gerüchte von Inkompetenz und Korruption haben die Autorität meiner Position untergraben, und es scheint, dass auch [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] an die Entscheidung gekommen, sie zu glauben, als ich von meiner Position auf dem Konzil entfernt wurden.
column6: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Rumors of incompetence and corruption have undermined the authority of my position, and it seems that even [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] have come to believe them as I have been removed from my position at the council.

column2: I am ruined!
column3: Je suis ruiné!
column4: Ich bin ruiniert!
column6: I am ruined!

column2: The attempt to discredit [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a success! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has dismissed [From.GetHerHim] from the council and [From.GetHerHis] position is now vacant and ready for me to occupy.
column3: La tentative pour discréditer [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été un succès! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] l'a renvoyé du conseil, son poste est maintenant libre et prest pour mon investiture.
column4: Der Versuch, [From.GetTitledFirstName] zu diskreditieren war erfolgreich! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] hat [From.GetHerHim] aus dem Rat abgewiesen und [From.GetHerHis] Position ist jetzt frei und bereit für mich zu besetzen.
column6: The attempt to discredit [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a success! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has dismissed [From.GetHerHim] from the council and [From.GetHerHis] position is now vacant and ready for me to occupy.

column2: Excellent!
column3: Excellent
column4: Gut!
column6: Excellent!

column2: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe it at first, but in the end I could not deny the weight of the evidence and was forced to remove [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] position at court.
column3: Dernièrement, j'ai ouï des rumeurs quant à l'incompétence de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. La nuit sous ma porte, quelqu'un a glissé des documents prouvant son implication dans des affaires de corruption. J'ai refusé d'y croire au premier abord, mais finalement je ne pouvais nier l'évidence et j'ai été contraint de retirer à [From.GetTitledFirstName] son poste à la cour.
column4: In letzter Zeit scheint es, dass ich nichts hörte, außer schlechtes von [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Von Flüstern der Inkompetenz am Hof, zur Dokumente von [From.GetHerHis] Korruption von die unter meiner Schlafzimmertür eines Nachtes geschlüpft wurde. Ich weigerte mich, es zuerst zu glauben, aber am Ende konnte ich es nicht leugnen. Das Gewicht der Beweismittel zwang mich [From.GetTitledFirstName] aus [From.GetHerHis] Stellung beim Hof zu entfernen.
column6: Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe it at first, but in the end I could not deny the weight of the evidence and was forced to remove [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] position at court.

column2: It had to be done
column3: Il falloit le faire
column4: Es musste getan werden.
column6: It had to be done

column2: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Although the investigation turned up nothing, my position at court is secure.
column3: Je me suis trouvé la cible d'une violente campagne de diffamation à la cour. Des rumeurs d'incompétence et des accusations de corruption ont été dirigées contre moi, mais heureusement [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] à refusé de leur donner créance et a ordonné une enqueste sur la source de ces rumeurs. Bien que l'enqueste n'a rien donné, ma position à la cour est sécurisée.
column4: Ich habe mich das Ziel einer bösartigen Verleumdungskampagne beim Hof gefunden. Flüstern der Inkompetenz und vorwürfe der Korruptions sind mir angerichtet. Glücklicherweiser hat [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] sich geweigert die Glaubwürdigkeit diese vorwürfe  zu würdigen und dazu geordnet eine Untersuchung der Quelle diese Gerüchte. Obwohl die Untersuchung nichts tauchte ist meine Position beim Hof sicher.
column6: I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Although the investigation turned up nothing, my position at court is secure.

column2: Who could have instigated such an underhanded scheme?
column3: Qui auroit pu tenter quelque chose d'aussi sournois ?
column4: Who could have instigated such an underhanded scheme?
column6: Who could have instigated such an underhanded scheme?

column2: Despite the rumors and accusations directed at [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to dismiss [From.GetHerHim] from the council and has ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Fortunately, the investigation turned up no evidence of my involvement.
column3: Malgré les rumeurs et accusations dirigées contre [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] a refusé de le renvoyer du conseil et a ordonné une enqueste sur la source de ces rumeurs. Heureusement, l'enqueste n'a mis à jour nulle preuve de mon implication.

A thorough questioning of the court turned up nothing, but has at least put a stop to the slanderous accusations.

La nuit sous ma porte, quelqu'un a glissé des documents prouvant son implication dans des affaires de corruption. J'ai refusé de croire ces accusations et ordonné une enqueste sur la source de ces rumeurs. L'interrogatoire n'a rien donné, mais cela a au moins mis un terme aulx accusations calomnieuses.

column2: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.
column3: Le convoi transportant la dixme et les taxes collectées pour [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] est sur le chemin du castel. Mes co-conspirateurs ont soudoyé les gardes afin qu'ils ne remarquent point l'éventuelle disparition d'un coffre ou deulx, tout est prest pour effectuer le vol.
column4: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.
column6: The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.

column2: We'll all be rich!
column3: A nous la richesse !
column4: We'll all be rich!
column6: We'll all be rich!

column2: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...
column3: Le convoi transportant les imposts et la dixme collectés est arrivé au castel aujourd'hui et les coffres ont été placés dans le trésor. Lorsque nous avons inspecté la livraison, il m'a semblé qu'il en manquait par rapport à la précédente perception. Une vérification rapide des comptes du trésorier a confirmé mes craintes...
column4: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...
column6: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...

column2: I have been robbed!
column3: On m'a volé !
column4: I have been robbed!
column6: I have been robbed!

column2: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.
column3: Les taxes ont été transportées dans le trésor, plusieurs grands coffres pleins d'or ont fait leur chemin à l'arrière d'un wagon et ont quitté le castel inaperçu. L'or est désormais en toute sécurité et mes co-conspirateurs ont tous reçu leur part.
column4: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.

column2: Everything went as planned!
column3: Tout s'est passé comme prévu !
column4: Everything went as planned!
column6: Everything went as planned!

column2: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: J'ai reçu ma part de l'argent de [From.GetTitledFirstName] détourné par  [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column4: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column6: I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. As I was watching the money being carried into the treasury, I noticed some shadowy figures trying to make off with several chests full of gold. I had my guards seize them, and under questioning they revealed themselves to be in the employ of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. What shall be done with my thieving vassal?
column3: Le convoi transportant la dixme et les taxes collectées arriva au castel aujourd'hui. Alors que je surveillois le transfert, j'ai remarqué quelques silhouettes qui tentoient de faire main basse sur plusieurs coffres pleins d'or. Je les ai mis sur-le-champ aulx fers et pendant l'interrogatoire, ils ont révélé estre à la solde de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Que faire de ce vassal sournois ?
column4: The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. As I was watching the money being carried into the treasury, I noticed some shadowy figures trying to make off with several chests full of gold. I had my guards seize them, and under questioning they revealed themselves to be in the employ of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. What shall be done with my thieving vassal?

column4: Throw [From.GetTitledFirstName] in irons!
column6: Throw [From.GetTitledFirstName] in irons!

column2: Off with [From.GetHerHis] head!

column4: Off with [From.GetHerHis] head!
column6: Off with [From.GetHerHis] head!

column2: Forgive [From.GetHerHim]
column3: Lui pardonner
column4: Forgive [From.GetHerHim]
column6: Forgive [From.GetHerHim]

column2: As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, my men tried to make off with several chests of gold but were spotted by [From.GetTitledFirstName], who had come out to inspect the process [From.GetHerHim]self. Under questioning they revealed to myself to be in my employ, and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I attempted to rob [From.GetHerHim].
column3: Le convoi transportant la dixme et les taxes collectées arriva au castel aujourd'hui. Mes hommes ont tenté de faire main basse sur plusieurs coffres d'or, mais ont été repérés par [From.GetTitledFirstName], qui estoit sorti pour inspecter le processus . Ils ont été arresté, et pendant l'interrogatoire ils ont révélé estre à mon service et maintenant [From.GetTitledFirstName] sait que j'ai essayé de [From.GetHerHim] voler.

column2: Retribution is sure to come...

column4: Retribution is sure to come...

column2: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetHerHis] liege. The evidence will discreetly find its way into the hands of [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], who cannot fail to act on it.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs ont fabriqué des preuves que [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] prévoit une révolte contre son seigneur [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetHerHis]. La preuve fera discrètement son chemin dans les mains de [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], qui devroit réagir.

column4: As I rose from bed, I found a small bundle of documents that had been slipped beneath my bedroom door. The documents contained evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s plans to depose me and seize the throne.
column6: As I rose from bed, I found a small bundle of documents that had been slipped beneath my bedroom door. The documents contained evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s plans to depose me and seize the throne.

column2: Nothing but lies and slander
column3: Rien que des mensonges et des calomnies
column4: Nothing but lies and slander
column6: Nothing but lies and slander

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to have me arrested for treason by slipping fabricated 'evidence' under [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] caught [From.GetHerHis] agent in the act and now it is [From.GetTitledFirstName] that stands accused of treason.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] a essayé de me faire arrester pour trahison en glissant des « preuves » fabriquées sous la porte de la chambre de [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], mais heureusement [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] a pris son agent sur le fait et maintenant [From.GetTitledFirstName] est accusé de trahison.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to have me arrested for treason by slipping fabricated 'evidence' under [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] caught [From.GetHerHis] agent in the act and now it is [From.GetTitledFirstName] that stands accused of treason.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to have me arrested for treason by slipping fabricated 'evidence' under [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] caught [From.GetHerHis] agent in the act and now it is [From.GetTitledFirstName] that stands accused of treason.

column2: How dare [From.GetSheHe]!
column3: Le vaurien !
column4: The bastard!
column6: The bastard!

column2: My agent was caught in the act of slipping the fabricated evidence under [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door. Even worse, my involvement was revealed during questioning and now I am the one that stands accused of treason.
column3: Mon agent a été surpris en train de glisser les éléments de preuve fabriquée sous la porte de la chambre de [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. Pis encor, mon implication a été révélée lors de l'interrogatoire et maintenant je suis accusé de trahison.
column4: My agent was caught in the act of slipping the fabricated evidence under [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door. Even worse, my involvement was revealed during questioning and now I am the one that stands accused of treason.
column6: My agent was caught in the act of slipping the fabricated evidence under [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door. Even worse, my involvement was revealed during questioning and now I am the one that stands accused of treason.

column2: This is bad!
column3: Malédiction !
column4: This is bad!
column6: This is bad!

column2: As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. Rushing outside, I found that my guards had seized a cloaked man as he was attempting to slip some documents into the room. Under questioning, he revealed that he was working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and that the documents were fabricated evidence intended to turn me against my vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: Comme je m'apprestois à dormir, j'ai ouï une bagarre derrière la porte de ma chambre. Me précipitant à l'extérieur l'arme a la main, j'ai constaté que mes gardes avoient saisi un homme masqué alors qu'il tentoit de glisser des documents dans ma chambre. En réponse aulx questions, il a révélé qu'il travailloit pour [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] et que les documents ont été fabriqués dans l'intention de semer la discorde entre mon vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] et moi.
column4: As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. Rushing outside, I found that my guards had seized a cloaked man as he was attempting to slip some documents into the room. Under questioning, he revealed that he was working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and that the documents were fabricated evidence intended to turn me against my vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName].
column6: As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. Rushing outside, I found that my guards had seized a cloaked man as he was attempting to slip some documents into the room. Under questioning, he revealed that he was working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and that the documents were fabricated evidence intended to turn me against my vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is the true traitor!
column3: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] est le vrai traistre !
column4: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is the true traitor!
column6: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is the true traitor!

column2: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s blasphemous conduct and sheltering of heretics. The letter will be sent to [Root.PlotTarget.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] who will be forced to excommunicate [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs ont fabriqué des preuves démontrant la conduite blasphématoire de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]qui abriterait des hérétiques. La lettre sera envoyée à [Root.PlotTarget.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] qui sera forcé de l'excommunier.
column4: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s blasphemous conduct and sheltering of heretics. The letter will be sent to [Root.PlotTarget.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] who will be forced to excommunicate [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
column6: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s blasphemous conduct and sheltering of heretics. The letter will be sent to [Root.PlotTarget.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] who will be forced to excommunicate [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].

column2: God will be my judge!
column3: Dieu sera le seul juge !
column4: God will be my judge!
column6: God will be my judge!

column2: Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has had me excommunicated based on fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter.
column3: [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] m'a excommunié en se basant sur une lettre anonyme contenant des «preuves» fabriquées, prouvant ma soi-disant hérésie.
column4: Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has had me excommunicated based on fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter.
column6: Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has had me excommunicated based on fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter.

column2: God preserve me from these lies!
column3: Dieu, protège-moi de ces menteurs par pitié !
column4: God preserve me from these lies!
column6: God preserve me from these lies!

column2: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been excommunicated and interdict has been placed on [From.GetHerHis] lands.
column3: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] a été complètement dupé par les preuves fabriquées prouvant l'hérésie de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetTitledFirstName] a été excommunié et un interdit a été prononcé sur ses terres.
column4: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been excommunicated and interdict has been placed on [From.GetHerHis] lands.
column6: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been excommunicated and interdict has been placed on [From.GetHerHis] lands.

column2: It was the will of God!
column3: C'est la volonté de Dieu !
column4: It was the will of God!
column6: It was the will of God!

column2: Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has received fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter. Fortunately, [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] dismissed it as the slanderous lie it is.
column3: [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] a recu une lettre anonyme contenant des «preuves» fabriquées, prouvant ma soi-disant hérésie. Heureusement, [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] a rejeté ces accusations diffamatoires
column4: Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has received fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter. Fortunately, [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] dismissed it as the slanderous lie it is.

column2: God looks after the faithful
column3: Dieu prend soin de ses fidèles
column4: God looks after the faithful
column6: God looks after the faithful

column2: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.
column3: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] a refusé de croire les preuves fabriquées démontrant l'hérésie de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Bien que le plan n'ait point fonctionné, il n'existe nulle preuve de mon implication.
column4: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.
column6: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.

column2: Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has received fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter. However, [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] not only refused to believe it, but had the messenger questioned until he revealed the sender of the letter.
column3: [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] a recu une lettre anonyme contenant des «preuves» fabriquées, prouvant ma soi-disant hérésie. Heureusement, [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe]a rejeté ces accusations diffamatoires et a interrogé le messager jusqu’à ce qu'il révèle son employeur.

column2: It was sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

column4: It was sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

column2: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. What's worse, [From.RelHead.GetSheHe] had the messenger questioned and found out that I sent it! I have been censured for my 'unseemly scheming' and [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I tried to have [From.GetHerHim] excommunicated.
column3: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] a refusé de croire les preuves fabriquées démontrant l 'hérésie de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. tristeusement le messager a révélé mon nom, j'ai été censuré pour propos blasphématoires et maintenant [From.GetTitledFirstName] sait que j'ai essayé de [From.GetHerHim] faire excommunier.
column4: [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. column2: This will not help my reputation...
column3: Cela ne va point améliorer ma réputation...
column4: This will not help my reputation...
column6: This will not help my reputation...

column2: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against me. I will circulate the evidence among my vassals so that they will support my actions against the 'traitor'.
column3: Mes co-conspirateurs ont fabriqué des preuves que [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] prépare une révolte contre moi. Je vais faire circuler les éléments de preuve parmi mes vassaulx pour qu'ils appuient mes actions contre ce «traistre».
column4: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against me. I will circulate the evidence among my vassals so that they will support my actions against the 'traitor'.
column6: My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against me. I will circulate the evidence among my vassals so that they will support my actions against the 'traitor'.

column2: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Though the evidence is obviously a forgery, it seems almost everyone in the realm has been fooled by it, and I fear I am about to be arrested.
column3: Des documents compromettant m'accusant de traistrise contre [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] ont circulé à travers le royaume. Bien que ces preuves soient fabriquées, il semble que cela été dupé presque tout le monde dans le royaume, et je crains que le jour de mon arrestation approche.
column4: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Though the evidence is obviously a forgery, it seems almost everyone in the realm has been fooled by it, and I fear I am about to be arrested.
column6: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Though the evidence is obviously a forgery, it seems almost everyone in the realm has been fooled by it, and I fear I am about to be arrested.

column2: Who could have done such a thing?!
column3: Qui auroit pu faire une chose pareille ?!
column4: Who could have done such a thing?!
column6: Who could have done such a thing?!

column2: My vassals were completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. I am now free to act against [From.GetHerHim].
column3: Mes vassaulx ont été complètement dupé par les preuves fabriquées prouvant la trahison de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Je suis maintenant libre d'agir contre [From.GetHerHim].
column4: My vassals were completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. I am now free to act against [From.GetHerHim].
column6: My vassals were completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. I am now free to act against [From.GetHerHim].

column2: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Fortunately most of the lords of the realm have dismissed it as the forgery it is.
column3: Des documents compromettant m'accusant de traistrise contre [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] ont circulé à travers le royaume. Heureusement, devant la grossièreté de ces soi-disant preuves, la plupart des seigneurs du royaume les ont rejetées.
column4: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Fortunately most of the lords of the realm have dismissed it as the forgery it is.
column6: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Fortunately most of the lords of the realm have dismissed it as the forgery it is.

column2: I wonder who was behind it...
column3: Je me demande qui estoit derrière tout ça ...
column4: I wonder who was behind it...
column6: I wonder who was behind it...

column2: My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.
column3: Mes vassaulx ont refusé de croire les preuves fabriquées démontrant la traistrise de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Bien que le plan n'ait point fonctionné, nulle preuve ne révèle mon implication.
column4: My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.
column6: My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.

column2: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. One of the forger's agents was caught while handing out the forgeries on my lands, and questioning revealed him to be working for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column3: Des documents compromettants m'accusant de traistrise contre [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] ont circulé à travers le royaume. Un des agents du faussaire a été pris en distribuant ces tracts fallacieulx sur mes terres et l'interrogatoire a révélé qu'il travailloit pour [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
column4: Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. One of the forger's agents was caught while handing out the forgeries on my lands, and questioning revealed him to be working for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

One of the forger's agents was caught while handing out the forgeries on my lands, and questioning revealed him to be working for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. What's worse, one of my agents was caught and questioned while circulating the forgeries, and my involvement has been revealed to all my vassals.
column3: Mes vassaulx ont refusé de croire les preuves fabriquées démontrant la traistrise de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Pis encor, un de mes agents a été capturé et interrogé pendant qu'il distribuoit les faulx documents et mon implication a été révélée à tous mes vassaulx.
column4: My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. What's worse, one of my agents was caught and questioned while circulating the forgeries, and my involvement has been revealed to all my vassals.
column6: My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. What's worse, one of my agents was caught and questioned while circulating the forgeries, and my involvement has been revealed to all my vassals.

column2: My reputation is ruined!
column3: Ma réputation est fichue !
column4: My reputation is ruined!
column6: My reputation is ruined!

column2: I shall inform the other conspirators at once!
column3: Je m'en vais de ce pas en informer sur-le-champ les aultres conjurés !
column4: I shall inform the other conspirators at once!
column6: I shall inform the other conspirators at once!

column2: Our soon-to-be-kidnappee will soon leave their well-guarded castle on a carriage ride with few guards along a windy forest road.  The perfect place for an ambush!
column3: Notre cible va bientost quitter son castel bien gardé dans un charriot protégé par quelques gardes le long d'une route venteuse à travers la forest. Le lieu parfait pour une embuscade !
column4: Our soon-to-be-kidnappee will soon leave their well-guarded castle on a carriage ride with few guards along a windy forest road.  The perfect place for an ambush!
column6: Our soon-to-be-kidnappee will soon leave their well-guarded castle on a carriage ride with few guards along a windy forest road.  The perfect place for an ambush!

column2: Let's make [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s journey a bit more interesting...
column3: Rendons le voyage de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] un peu plus intéressant...
column4: Let's make [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s journey a bit more interesting...
column6: Let's make [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s journey a bit more interesting...

column2: That's too risky...
column3: C'est trop risqué...
column4: That's too risky...
column6: That's too risky...

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has informed me that our target, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName], will soon be taking a long carriage ride, and wants to spring an ambush.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] m'a informé que notre cible, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName], commencera bientost un long voyage en charriot, et veult déclencher une embuscade.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has informed me that our target, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName], will soon be taking a long carriage ride, and wants to spring an ambush.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has informed me that our target, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName], will soon be taking a long carriage ride, and wants to spring an ambush.

column2: You'll pay for this, [From.GetFirstName]!
column3: Tu le paieras, [From.GetFirstName] !
column4: You'll pay for this, [From.GetFirstName]!
column6: You'll pay for this, [From.GetFirstName]!

column2: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  They slaughter your guards, chain you, and deliver you to [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: Alors que votre charriot voyage le long de la route venteuse à travers la forest, vous tombez dans une embuscade tendue par des bandits de grand chemin ! Ils massacrent vos gardes, vous enchaisnent, et vous remettent à [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  They slaughter your guards, chain you, and deliver you to [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column6: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  They slaughter your guards, chain you, and deliver you to [From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: And I, I took the road less traveled by.  And has made all the difference...
column3: Et moi, j'ai pris la route moins fréquentée. Et cela a fait toute la différence...
column4: And I, I took the road less traveled by.  And has made all the difference...
column6: And I, I took the road less traveled by.  And has made all the difference...

column2: As your carriage travels through the forest, you doze off into a peaceful sleep.  You awaken to find that you've safely arrived at your destination, but it seems a gang of bandits and highwaymen have been active on another road in that forest this very day
column3: Tandis que votre charriot voyage à travers la forest, vous vous assoupissez dans un paisible sommeil. Vous vous réveillez pour vous retrouver sain et sauf à votre destination, mais il semble qu'une bande de coupe-jarrets et de bandits de grand chemin se soient montrés sur une aultre route dans la forest ce mesme jour
column4: As your carriage travels through the forest, you doze off into a peaceful sleep.  You awaken to find that you've safely arrived at your destination, but it seems a gang of bandits and highwaymen have been active on another road in that forest this very day
column6: As your carriage travels through the forest, you doze off into a peaceful sleep.  You awaken to find that you've safely arrived at your destination, but it seems a gang of bandits and highwaymen have been active on another road in that forest this very day

column2: This shall not go unanswered.
column3: Cela ne sera point sans conséquence.
column4: This shall not go unanswered.
column6: This shall not go unanswered.

column2: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  Fortunately, your guards are well-trained and quickly dispatch them.  As one lays dying, he admits he was sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to kidnap you.
column3: Alors que votre charriot voyage le long de la route venteuse à travers la forest, vous tombez dans une embuscade tendue par des bandits de grand chemin ! Heureusement, vos gardes sont bien entraisnés et se débarrassent d'eulx. Alors que l'un d'entre eulx gist agonisant, il admet avoir été envoyé par [From.GetTitledFirstName] pour vous enlever.
column4: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  Fortunately, your guards are well-trained and quickly dispatch them.  As one lays dying, he admits he was sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to kidnap you.
column6: As your carriage travels the windy forest road, you're ambushed by highwaymen!  Fortunately, your guards are well-trained and quickly dispatch them.  As one lays dying, he admits he was sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to kidnap you.

column2: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: J'ai un cachot qui n'attend que toi, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column6: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: Your plan goes off without a hitch, and [From.GetTitledFirstName] is pulled from his carriage and dragged before you in chains, begging for mercy
column3: Votre plan se déroule sans accroc, et [From.GetTitledFirstName] est enlevé de son charriot et amené devant vous enchaisné, vous implorant de vous montrer clément
column4: Your plan goes off without a hitch, and [From.GetTitledFirstName] is pulled from his carriage and dragged before you in chains, begging for mercy
column6: Your plan goes off without a hitch, and [From.GetTitledFirstName] is pulled from his carriage and dragged before you in chains, begging for mercy

column2: We shall have to try again.
column3: Nous n'aurons qu'à essayer à nouveau.
column4: We shall have to try again.
column6: We shall have to try again.

column2: The mercenaries, dressed as highwaymen were all prepared, but it seems either they managed to get lost in the forest, or you were mis-informed about [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s route.  The plot has failed, but at least we were undiscovered.
column3: Les mercenaires, déguisés en bandits de grand chemin, estoient prests pour l'embuscade, mais il semble que [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] se soit perdu(e) dans la forest, ou alors vous avez été mal informé de son itinéraire. Le complot a échoué, mais au moins nous n'avons point été découverts.
column4: The mercenaries, dressed as highwaymen were all prepared, but it seems either they managed to get lost in the forest, or you were mis-informed about [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s route.  The plot has failed, but at least we were undiscovered.
column6: The mercenaries, dressed as highwaymen were all prepared, but it seems either they managed to get lost in the forest, or you were mis-informed about [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s route.  The plot has failed, but at least we were undiscovered.

column2: It's so hard to find good help these days
column3: Il est si difficile de trouver des gens compétents de nos jours
column4: It's so hard to find good help these days
column6: It's so hard to find good help these days

column2: Disaster!  Not only did your ambush fail miserably, but one of the dying mercenaries has fingered you as the ringleader of the plot.
column3: Catastrophe ! Non seulement votre embuscade a lamentablement échoué, mais un de vos mercenaires agonisants vous a désigné comme le meneur du complot.
column4: Disaster!  Not only did your ambush fail miserably, but one of the dying mercenaries has fingered you as the ringleader of the plot.
column6: Disaster!  Not only did your ambush fail miserably, but one of the dying mercenaries has fingered you as the ringleader of the plot.

column2: I shall inform the other conspirators at once!
column3: Je m'en vais de ce pas en informer sur-le-champ les aultres conjurés !
column4: I shall inform the other conspirators at once!
column6: I shall inform the other conspirators at once!

column2: One of my soldiers has managed to get himself hired as part of our plot target's personal guard.  Now we have an inside man and when he draws the night shift we can try to grab our target under cover of darkness
column3: Un de mes soldats a réussi à se faire recruter dans la garde personnelle de la cible de notre complot. Nous avons à présent un espion infiltré et, quand il sera de garde de nuit, nous pourrons essayer d'enlever notre cible à la faveur de la nuit
column4: One of my soldiers has managed to get himself hired as part of our plot target's personal guard.  Now we have an inside man and when he draws the night shift we can try to grab our target under cover of darkness
column6: One of my soldiers has managed to get himself hired as part of our plot target's personal guard.  Now we have an inside man and when he draws the night shift we can try to grab our target under cover of darkness

column2: Sweet dreams, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]
column3: Fais de beaulx resves, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]
column4: Sweet dreams, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]
column6: Sweet dreams, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]

column2: That's too risky...
column3: C'est trop risqué...
column4: That's too risky...
column6: That's too risky...

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to get a man inside [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s guard.  We now have a fine opening to break in and steal him away while he sleeps.
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] a réussi à infiltrer un homme dans la garde personnelle de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. Nous avons à présent une bonne opportunité de l'atteindre et de l'enlever pendant son sommeil.
column4: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to get a man inside [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s guard.  We now have a fine opening to break in and steal him away while he sleeps.
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to get a man inside [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s guard.  We now have a fine opening to break in and steal him away while he sleeps.

column2: Do I at least get a pillow?
column3: Puis-je au moins avoir un oreiller ?
column4: Do I at least get a pillow?
column6: Do I at least get a pillow?

column2: In the dead of night, you're suddenly awoken with three sword points in your face.  Bound and gagged, you're thrown in a carriage and taken to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.  Your new stone bed is considerably less comfortable than your feather bed at home.
column3: Au milieu de la nuitée, vous estes soudainement réveillé par trois épées pointées sur votre visage. Ligoté et basillonné, vous estes balancé sur un charriot et emmené dans les geosles de [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Votre nouvelle couche de pierre est considérablement moins confortable que la couche de plumes de votre logis.
column4: In the dead of night, you're suddenly awoken with three sword points in your face.  Bound and gagged, you're thrown in a carriage and taken to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.  Your new stone bed is considerably less comfortable than your feather bed at home.
column6: In the dead of night, you're suddenly awoken with three sword points in your face.  Bound and gagged, you're thrown in a carriage and taken to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.  Your new stone bed is considerably less comfortable than your feather bed at home.

column2: We'll need a few more guards
column3: On va avoir besoin de quelques gardes de plus
column4: We'll need a few more guards
column6: We'll need a few more guards

column2: You're awakened in the night to the sounds of a scuffle – it appears some unknown infiltrators had the audacity to try to break into your chambers.  Why they came or what they wanted is a secret they took to the grave.
column3: Vous estes réveillé dans la nuitée par le son d'une bagarre - il semble que des infiltrés inconnus ont eu l'audace d'essayer de s'introduire dans vos quartiers. La raison de leur intrusion est un secret qu'ils emportent avec eulx dans leur trépas.
column4: You're awakened in the night to the sounds of a scuffle – it appears some unknown infiltrators had the audacity to try to break into your chambers.  Why they came or what they wanted is a secret they took to the grave.
column6: You're awakened in the night to the sounds of a scuffle – it appears some unknown infiltrators had the audacity to try to break into your chambers.  Why they came or what they wanted is a secret they took to the grave.

column2: Luckily he was caught before he could do any harm
column3: Heureusement, il a été capturé avant d'avoir pu nous nuire
column4: Luckily he was caught before he could do any harm
column6: Luckily he was caught before he could do any harm

column2: It seems the hiring policies for the guards around here have been a bit lax.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to plant a mole within your walls.
column3: Il sembleroit que la politique de recrutement des gardes se soit quelque peu relaschée par ici.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] a réussi à infiltrer une taupe dans vos murs.
column4: It seems the hiring policies for the guards around here have been a bit lax.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to plant a mole within your walls.
column6: It seems the hiring policies for the guards around here have been a bit lax.  [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to plant a mole within your walls.

column2: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: J'ai un cachot qui n'attend que toi, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column4: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column6: I've got a cell all prepared for you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged before you in chains.  His captors tell a captivating tale of a daring midnight infiltration, no doubt slightly embellished.  You have your prisoner, let the men have their tall tales
column3: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] est amené devant vous enchaisné. Ses ravisseurs narrent une histoire captivante d'une infiltration osée à minuit, sans nul doute légèrement embellie. Vous avez votre prisonnier, ils peuvent bien conter leur histoire
column4: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged before you in chains.  His captors tell a captivating tale of a daring midnight infiltration, no doubt slightly embellished.  You have your prisoner, let the men have their tall tales
column6: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is dragged before you in chains.  His captors tell a captivating tale of a daring midnight infiltration, no doubt slightly embellished.  You have your prisoner, let the men have their tall tales

column2: We shall have to try again.
column3: Nous n'aurons qu'à essayer à nouveau.
column4: We shall have to try again.
column6: We shall have to try again.

column2: Your inside man lets the infiltrators through [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s gates, but they're discovered before they can grab [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] from [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bed.  Fortunately, they were all killed in the ensuing scuffle, and there's no trace of your complicity
column3: Votre taupe laisse vos hommes passer les portes de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName], mais ils sont repérés avant de pouvoir l'enlever de sa couche. Heureusement, ils sont tous occis dans la bagarre qui s'ensuivit, et il n'y a nulle trace de votre complicité
column4: Your inside man lets the infiltrators through [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s gates, but they're discovered before they can grab [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] from [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bed.  Fortunately, they were all killed in the ensuing scuffle, and there's no trace of your complicity
column6: Your inside man lets the infiltrators through [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s gates, but they're discovered before they can grab [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] from [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] bed.  Fortunately, they were all killed in the ensuing scuffle, and there's no trace of your complicity

column2: It's so hard to find good help these days
column3: Il est si difficile de trouver des gens compétents de nos jours
column4: It's so hard to find good help these days
column6: It's so hard to find good help these days

column2: Your inside man is unmasked by another of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards.  Under threat of torture he reveals your involvement.
column3: Votre taupe est démasquée par un aultre garde de [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Sous la menace de torture, il révèle votre implication.
column4: Your inside man is unmasked by another of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards.  Under threat of torture he reveals your involvement.
column6: Your inside man is unmasked by another of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards.  Under threat of torture he reveals your involvement.

column2: Tonight may be the night. I spotted [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] going up to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] rooms alone after an eve of drinking. I doubt [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is in a condition to resist my charms, if I choose to follow.
column3: Tonight may be the night. I spotted [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] going up to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] rooms alone after an eve of drinking. I doubt [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is in a condition to resist my charms, if I choose to follow.
column4: Tonight may be the night. I spotted [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] going up to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] rooms alone after an eve of drinking. I doubt [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is in a condition to resist my charms, if I choose to follow.

column2: It's now or never!
column3: C'est maintenant ou jamais !
column4: It's now or never!
column6: It's now or never!

column2: I lack the courage...
column3: Je n'ai point assez de courage...
column4: I lack the courage...
column6: I lack the courage...

column2: I've observed the comings and going of the target of a particularly romantic plot, and think I can faciliate a private meeting for the two of them.
column3: J'ai observé les allées et venues de la cible d'une certaine intrigue amoureuse , et je songe pouvoir faciliter une rencontre en privé entre eulx deulx.
column4: I've observed the comings and going of the target of a particularly romantic plot, and think I can faciliate a private meeting for the two of them.
column6: I've observed the comings and going of the target of a particularly romantic plot, and think I can facilitate a private meeting for the two of them.

column2: Send a message to the plotter.
column3: Envoyer un message au comploteur.
column4: Send a message to the plotter.
column6: Send a message to the plotter.

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has contacted me, saying [From.GetSheHe] believes that [From.GetSheHe] can help me meet [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] privately, and in a condition where [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] will almost certainly be unable to resist my charms...
column3: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has contacted me, saying [From.GetSheHe] believes that [From.GetSheHe] can help me meet [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] privately, and in a condition where [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] will almost certainly be unable to resist my charms...

column2: The plan was successful. I crept into [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s bed, and before [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] could react, I showed [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] what a night with a real [Root.GetManWoman] looks like. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] did not ask me to leave.
column3: The plan was successful. I crept into [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s bed, and before [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] could react, I showed [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] what a night with a real [Root.GetManWoman] looks like. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] did not ask me to leave.

column2: It happened rather suddenly. One moment I was alone in my bed, and then the next [From.GetTitledFirstName] was there with me. I was about to cry for the guards, but the things [From.GetSheHe] he did... I did not want them to stop, and I have not wanted to since the night it happened. I cannot stop thinking about [From.GetHerHim].
column3: It happened rather suddenly. One moment I was alone in my bed, and then the next [From.GetTitledFirstName] was there with me. column2: How did that happen? Was I drinking?
column3: How did that happen? Was I drinking?
column4: How did that happen? Was I drinking?
column6: How did that happen? Was I drinking?

column2: My attempts at seduction have failed! [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] not only threw me out of his room, but threatened to have the guards throw me out of the castle as well. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] is not pleased with me, and [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is not the only one.
column3: My attempts at seduction have failed! [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] not only threw me out of his room, but threatened to have the guards throw me out of the castle as well. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHeCap] is not pleased with me, and [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is not the only one.

column2: It happened so quickly. One minute I was alone in my bed, and the next I woke to discover [From.GetTitledFirstName] attempting to seduce me. I threw [From.GetHerHim] out in a rage, and threatened to call the guards if [From.GetSheHe] tried anything so outrageous again. The nerve of the [From.GetManWoman]!
column3: It happened so quickly. One minute I was alone in my bed, and the next I woke to discover [From.GetTitledFirstName] attempting to seduce me. I threw [From.GetHerHim] out in a rage, and threatened to call the guards if [From.GetSheHe] tried anything so outrageous again. The nerve of the [From.GetManWoman]!

I threw [From.GetHerHim] out in a rage, and threatened to call the guards if [From.GetSheHe] tried anything so outrageous again. The nerve of the [From.GetManWoman]!
